ARABIC: وَيَقُولُونَ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَبِٱلرَّسُولِ وَأَطَعْنَا ثُمَّ يَتَوَلَّىٰ فَرِيقٌ مِّنْهُم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ وَمَآ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They say, 'We have iman in Allah and in the Messenger and we obey.' Then after that a group of them turn away. Such people are not muminun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They say they believe in God and the Prophet, and have come to believe, yet a section of them turns back even after this; and these are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: These people say "We have believed in Allah and the Messenger and we have submitted"; but soon after this, some of them turn away (from obedience): such people are not true Believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They say, "We have believed in God and the Messenger and we have obeyed them." Then a group of them turn away from their (belief). They are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they say, “We have accepted faith in Allah and His Noble Messenger, and we obey”; then after that a group among them turns away; and they are not Muslims.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They say: "We have believed in Allah and in the Messenger, and we obey," then a party of them turn away thereafter, such are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they say: We believe in Allah and in the apostle and we obey; then a party of them turn back after this, and these are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They say, 'We believe in God and the Messenger, and we obey.' Then after that a party of them turn away; those -- they are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they say: We believe in Allah and the messenger, and we obey; then after that a faction of them turn away. Such are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They say, "We believe in God and in the Messenger, and we obey." But then, even after that a group of them will turn away. Those are surely not believers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they say: we have believed in Allah and in the apostle and we have obeyed; then there backslide a party of them thereafter: and these are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They say, ‘We have faith in Allah and His Apostle, and we obey.’ Then, after that, a part of them refuse to comply, and they do not have faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They say, "We believe in Allah and in the messenger, and we obey": but even after that, some of them turn away: they are not (really) Believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They (hypocrites) say: "We have believed in Allah and in the Messenger (Muhammad SAW), and we obey," then a party of them turn away thereafter, such are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They say: 'We believe in Allah and the Messenger and obey' But a party of them turn away after this. Those are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they say, “We have believed in God and the Messenger, and we obey,” but some of them turn away afterwards. These are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But the hypocrites say, "We have believed in Allah and in the Messenger, and we obey"; then a party of them turns away after that. And those are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [24:47]   And they, the hypocrites, say, ‘We believe in, we affirm [the truth of], God, [of] His Oneness, and the Messenger, Muhammad (s), and we obey’, them in what rulings they [God and Muhammad] give. Then after that a party of them turn away, they are averse to it, and those, those who are averse, they are not believers, as [believers] should be, [believers] whose hearts agree with [the words of] their tongues.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then revealed the following about the folk of 'Uthman who told the latter: "do not go to the Prophet (pbuh) in order to settle your dispute with 'AN regarding a piece of land, because He will take 'All's side", and 'Uthman rebuked them for saying this: (And they say) i.e. the people of 'Uthman: (We believe in Allah and the messenger) we are sincere in our belief in Allah and the Messenger, (and we obey) that with which we have been commanded; (then after that) after saying this about obeying Allah (a faction of them) of the people of 'Uthman (turn away. Such are not believers) who are sincere in their faith.
